products.name: Purge Trooper Commander Hot Toys vgm67 - Star Wars Jedi Survivor action figure 1/6
products.description:
Background to the creation of the Purge Trooper Commander vgm67 action figure by Hot Toys

In the Star Wars Jedi Survivor video game, the Purge Trooper Commander is an elite adversary tasked with hunting down Jedi survivors after Order 66. Possessing advanced combat skills and strategic expertise, these commanders lead squads of Purge Troopers and employ specialised abilities to counter Jedi techniques. Their special weapons and armour make them formidable foes, providing intense, tactical combat that reflects the Empire's relentless hunt for the remaining Jedi. Hot Toys is offering a meticulously crafted 1/6th scale action figure inspired by the Purge Trooper Commander from Star Wars Jedi Survivor. This exclusive action figure is limited to 2,500 units and is only available in select markets.

 

What are the features of the Hot Toys Purge Trooper Commander vgm67 action figure?

The Hot Toys Purge Trooper Commander vgm67 action figure has the following features:

- Authentic and detailed likeness to the Purge Trooper Commander in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor

- Purge Trooper Commander helmet manufactured with wear effects and LED lighting function (orange light, battery operated)

- Specially applied black coloured paint on armour with weathering effects

- Size approximately 30 cm

- Body with over 30 points of articulation

- Six (6) interchangeable gloved hands, including:

>One (1) pair of relaxed hands

>One (1) pair of hands for holding the blaster rifle

> One (1) open left hand

> One (1) right hand with fist

 

What elements make up the Purge Trooper Commander Hot Toys vgm67 action figure costume?

The Purge Trooper Commander Hot Toys vgm67 action figure comes with a costume including:

- One (1) black Purge Trooper Commander armour made with red and white detailing and ageing effects

- One (1) black under-suit

- One (1) pair of shoulder pads with quilted details and wear effects.

- One (1) black belt with kama

- One (1) pair of black boots with aging effects

 

What weapons come with the vgm67 Purge Trooper Commander Hot Toys action figure?

The vgm67 Purge Trooper Commander Hot Toys action figure comes with the following weapons:

- One (1) blaster rifle with one (1) detachable scope (magnetic attachment) and two (2) interchangeable muzzles

 

What accessories come with the vgm67 Hot Toys Purge Trooper Commander action figure?

The vgm67 Hot Toys Purge Trooper Commander action figure comes with the following accessories:

- Specially designed action figure stand with character identification plate

 

What materials were used to make the Purge Trooper Commander Hot Toys Videogame Masterpiece action figure?

The Purge Trooper Commander Hot Toys Videogame Masterpiece action figure is a product made from ABS and PVC.

The action figure's clothing is made from fabric.

products.name: Moon Knight Action Figure 1/6 Moon Knight Artisan Edition 29 cm
products.description:
In 2022, Moon Knight made his screen debut as the first comic character to be featured in a Marvel Studios' TV series besides the ones that have previously appeared in the movie theatre. Starring Oscar Isaac, the series brought Moon Knight to the spotlight with its phenomenal plot and outstanding narrative.

Today, Hot Toys is excited to present an Artisan Edition of the 1/6th scale Moon Knight collectible figure that captures the exquisite likeness of Marc Spector/Steven Grant with an all-new head sculpt, complemented by intricate wool hair implant technique that allows a faithful representation of the character. This is an exclusive release available with limited quantity of 2,500 pieces only in selected markets.

Exquisitely crafted based on Oscar Isaac's screen appearance as Moon Knight in the spin-off, the figure features a newly developed head sculpt with separate rolling eyeballs, an LED-lighted masked head, and sculpted bandages throughout the body. The weathering effect accentuates the Moon Knight costume, which is adorned with ancient symbols and patterns, creating an authentic representation of the character's suit. The finely tailored suit also comes with a fabric belt and sculpted boots. Additionally, variety of sizes for his signature crescent blades and a figure stand are included to enhance display options.

The Artisan Edition of the fist of Khonshu is definitely a must-have for those who want to go behind the mask.

- Available in the limited quantity of 2,500 units in selected markets
- 1 newly developed head sculpt with short-length curly dark brown hair implantation (wool material) and separate rolling eyeball system
- 1 interchangeable masked head sculpt with hood and LED light up function design on eyes (white light, battery operated)
Body with 30 points of articulation
- 10 pieces of interchangeable wrapped hands including:
- 1 pair of fists
- 1 pair of relaxed hands
- 1 pair of gesture hands
- 1 pair of hands for holding crescent blades
- 1 pair of hands for throwing crescent blades
- Wrapped in sculpted bandages
- 8 crescent blades in different sizes (large, medium, small)

The box containing the General Grievous figure also includes a display stand, a gray and red cape with a posable wire, and the following weapons:

- Four LED-lit lightsaber hilts (USB-powered)

- Two lightsaber hilts with removable green blades

- One green motion lightsaber blade (attachable to the hilt)

- Two lightsaber hilts with removable blue blades

- One blue motion lightsaber blade (attachable to the hilt)

- An electrostaff

- A blaster

- A pair of lightning effect accessories (can be attached to the electrostaff)

The interchangeable parts of the figure include:

- Two masks (normal and battle damaged versions)

- Two sets of battle-damaged arms

 

Technical Features of the Hot Toys General Grievous figure

The LED system of General Grievous' lightsabers is USB-powered.

Hot Toys offers on this figure its individual eye-orientation system as well as a specific diecast metal body with 25 points of articulation.

 

Manufacturing Information Provided by Hot Toys

Composition: ABS, PVC, and metal.

 

Buy the General Grievous Hot Toys figure at Myth Factory

products.name: Iron Man Movie Masterpiece Diecast Action Figure 1/6 Iron Man Mark III (Red & Chrome Version) Hot Toys Exclusive 32 cm
products.description:
Tony Stark's iconic Iron Man is undoubtedly one of the most charismatic and celebrated heroes in the Marvel universe, with his unparalleled genius on full display in the legendary Mark III armor first seen in the first Iron Man film.

Sideshow and Hot Toys is continuing to expand the Marvel action figure collection with an impressive Iron Man Mark III (Red & Chrome version) Sixth Scale Collectible Figure, showcasing a new color combination for this suit of armor. It's an exclusive figure with limited quantity of 3,000 units available only in selected markets.

Measures 32.5cm tall, the diecast sixth-scale figure captures the intricate mechanical complexity of Iron Man Mark III armor. Features a finely crafted Iron Man helmet with LED light up function on eyes, chest, and palms; great range of motion allows for dynamic posing; beautifully crafted armor meticulously painted with metallic red and silver chrome; different forms of interchangeable forearm armors simulating missile firing mode and protection shield mode; and a figure base with LED light up function that perfectly complements the suit's luxurious color scheme.

This special chrome version figure will undoubtedly be a true centerpiece for your Marvel display!

products.name: Star Wars Movie Masterpiece Action Figure 1/6 Darth Sidious 29 cm
products.description:
Scheming, powerful, and evil to the core, Darth Sidious restored the Sith and destroyed the Jedi Order. Living a double life, he was also Palpatine, a Naboo Senator and phantom menace. He manipulated the political system of the Galactic Republic until he was named Supreme Chancellor -- and eventually Emperor - and ruled the galaxy through fear and tyranny.

Expanding the Hot Toys Star Wars dark side collection, Sideshow and Hot Toys is pleased to introduce the Darth Sidious Sixth Scale Collectible Figure the most infamous Sith of them all!

The highly detailed Star Wars action figure is masterfully created featuring a newly developed head sculpt with a menacing likeness and a separate rolling eyeballs system allowing a positionable eye line, a finely tailored outfit, a LED light-up Lightsaber™ powered by USB, Force lightning effects, and a figure base!

The power of your Star Wars dark side collection will grow with the addition of this new Darth Sidious Sixth Scale Collectible Figure!

products.name: Star Wars Episode I Movie Masterpiece Action Figure 1/6 Darth Maul 29 cm
products.description:
Darth Maul longed for revenge against the Jedi. He was finally unleashed by his Master, Darth Sidious, in an assassination attempt on Queen Amidala on the outskirts of Tatooine. He battled briefly with Qui-Gon Jinn, the Queen's Jedi escort, but could not reach his target. Later, Maul waited for Amidala on Naboo, where he dueled with Qui-Gon and his apprentice, Obi-Wan Kenobi. The Sith fought with blinding speed and impressive agility, and stabbed Jinn through with his red double-bladed lightsaber; he would prove unable to best Obi-Wan, however. The young Jedi, in a surprising move, cut Maul in two and sent him tumbling down the planet's core, seemingly destroyed.

Sideshow and Hot Toys are revisiting the Darth Maul action figure for the 25th anniversary of Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace, and are delighted to present the Darth Maul Sixth Scale Collectible Figure possessing great detail. This dedication provides fans with head sculpts that capture remarkable expressions, and the outfit iss carefully recreated to ensure a faithful representation of Darth Maul.

The Darth Maul Star Wars collectible figure is crafted based on his appearance in the film, features two newly developed head sculpts with separate rolling eyeball system showcasing serious and grinning expressions, newly tailored robe with enhanced fitting, Darth Maul's iconic double-bladed Lightsaber™ with USB powered LED light-up function, a Sith probe droid, binoculars, a range of interchangeable hands for various posing options, and a specially designed figure stand.

Reserve this masterpiece to upgrade your Star Wars action figure collection!

products.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales DX Action Figure 1/6 Jack Sparrow (Deluxe Version) 30 cm
products.description:
Captain Jack Sparrow must once again battle the forces of fate upon treacherous seas. He finds himself pursued relentlessly by his old nemesis Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the mysterious Devil's Triangle. They're determined to kill every pirate at sea...notably him!

Sideshow and Hot Toys proudly present the latest addition to any captain's quarters - the Deluxe Version of the Jack Sparrow Sixth Scale Collectible Figure from our DX Series. Drawing from his most recent swashbuckling exploits, this masterpiece is sure to become the pride of any collection celebrating the Pirates of the Caribbean saga!

Inspired by the Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales, the Captain Jack Sparrow collectible figure recreated the charismatic pirate in breathtaking detail. His portrait features a styled beard, the iconic dreadlocked and braid hairstyle sculpted, and strands of wool hair implanted individually on a screen-accurate head sculpt with an impeccably realistic likeness. In addition to his signature smirk, a serious expression is available to capture more on-screen moments. Both face sculpts feature separate rolling eyeballs to further enrich the realism.

His detail appearance is complete with a finely tailored fabric costume, including a long coat, shirt, patterned vest, genuine leather made belts and long boots. A veritable armory of weapons and accessories is also provided, such as the saber, flintlock pistols and an LED-lighted lantern.

The deluxe version includes an elaborate environmental diorama base meticulously crafted to resemble a segment of the Black Pearl and a treasure chest for your immersive display.

It's time for a grand adventure at the high seas! Don't miss out on the opportunity to get accompanied by Captain Jack Sparrow action figure!

products.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales DX Action Figure 1/6 Jack Sparrow 30 cm
products.description:
Yo, Ho! This's a pirate's life for... Captain Jack Sparrow's luck has run out. Captain Salazar, the oldest of JAck Sparrow's nemeses, has released the deadliest ghost pirates of the sea from the Devil's Triangle. The ghost pirates hunt every single pirate at sea, including Jack Sparrow.

Sideshow and Hot Toys are proud to welcome the Jack Sparrow Sixth Scale Collectible Figure from our DX Series collection! Drawing from his most iconic screen adventures, this intricately crafted piece revisits the daring pirate who has enthralled audiences across the Pirates of the Caribbean saga. With meticulous attention to period garments, weapons, and of course, Jack's signature roguish charm, the sixth scale action figure transports fans directly to the movie scenes they love.

The screen-accurate Disney collectible figure is crafted based on Jack Sparrow's appearance in Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales. It features a highly-detailed head sculpt with a styled beard, the iconic dreadlocked and braid hairstyle sculpted, and strands of wool hair implanted individually. In addition to his signature smirk, a serious expression is available to capture more on-screen moments. Both face sculpts feature separate rolling eyeballs to further enrich the realism.

His detailed appearance is complete with a finely tailored fabric costume, including a long coat, shirt, patterned vest, genuine leather-made belts, and long boots. A veritable armory of weapons and accessories is also provided, such as the saber, flintlock pistols and an LED-lighted lantern.

Set a course to bring the scoundrel aboard! The infamous Captain Jack Sparrow is ready to conquer your most adventurous collection!

products.description:
Our opinion about this Hot Toys Mandalorian Super Commando figure

Emblematic character from the battle for Mandalore in the Star Wars Clone Wars TV series, it was ultimately his cameo in the Ashoka series that earned him a release by Hot Toys in its 1/6 Star Wars range. An excellent companion for your Darth Maul figure.

 

Detail of accessories supplied with the figure

The box contains an exhibition stand, a blaster rifle, a blaster pistol, a magnetically attached jetpack and an energy shield that attaches to the wrists.

The figure features 30 points of articulation for highly realistic poses.

 

Manufacturing information

Composition: ABS and PVC.

The figure's clothing is made of fabric.

products.name: Star Wars: Ahsoka Action Figure 1/6 Ahsoka Tano (Padawan) 27 cm
products.description:
Ahsoka Tano was discovered by Jedi Master Plo Koon as a small child and accepted into the Jedi Order. When she was 14, Jedi Master Yoda granted Ahsoka the rank of Padawan and she was partnered with Anakin Skywalker, a powerful if reckless Jedi Knight. Anakin initially bristled at the idea of having an apprentice, and their early interactions were playfully contentious; he called her "Snips" for her witty retorts, and Ahsoka called him "Skyguy." But they bonded on the battlefield and Anakin gained a newfound respect for Ahsoka.

Expanding the growing collectible lineup inspired by the Ahsoka live-action series, Sideshow and Hot Toys is thrilled to present the Ahsoka Tano Sixth Scale Collectible Figure as she was seen as a Padawan in the World Between Worlds!

The Ahsoka Tano collectible figure features a newly developed head sculpt with articulated lekku and separate rolling eyeballs to adjust the eyesight, a skillfully tailored outfit, a lightsaber, and a sand-themed display base!

A Padawan Ahsoka Tano collectible figure will be a great addition among your Star Wars collectible collection!

products.name: Spider-Man 2 Video Game Masterpiece Action Figure 1/6 Peter Parker (Superior Suit) 30 cm
products.description:
Marvel's Spider-Man 2 features an extensive range of suits for fans to explore and enjoy, and one of these suits is the Superior Suit. Inspired by the critically acclaimed Superior Spider-Man comic book series released by Marvel in 2013, this suit brings to life the distinct design and characteristics of the beloved character.

Adding onto the Marvel's Spider-Man 2 collection, Sideshow and Hot Toys are excited to present the Peter Parker (Superior Suit) Sixth Scale Collectible Figure, bringing more options to your stylish display!

The game-inspired Spider-Man Action Figure features a newly developed masked head with two pairs of interchangeable eye pieces, a hugely-poseable body for dynamic poses, a meticulously tailored superior suit in red and black with asymmetric patterns and black spider emblem, newly designed metallic red spider pincers allowing a great range of articulations, webbing accessories, hands in different gestures and a figure stand for display.

Display the Peter Parker (Superior Suit) Sixth Scale Figure alongside other Spidey collection! This Marvel Collectible will sure to be something that you do not want to miss!

products.name: Star Wars: Episode VI Action Figure 1/6 Han Solo 30 cm
products.description:
Han Solo rose from an impoverished childhood on the mean streets of Corellia to become one of the heroes of the Rebel Alliance. As captain of the Millennium Falcon, Han and his co-pilot Chewbacca came to believe in the cause of galactic freedom, joining Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia Organa in the fight against the Empire.

Sideshow and Hot Toys is very excited to officially present the brand new Han Solo Sixth Scale Figure based on the monumental Star Wars: Return Of The Jedi!

The highly-accurate Han Solo collectible figure is skillfully crafted based on his appearance in the movie. It features a stunning head sculpt with great likeness and rotatable eyeballs, a finely tailored outfit with a camouflage coat, a blaster, and an Endor-themed environmental figure base!

This Han Solo Sixth Scale Collectible Figure will be perfect for any Star Wars collectible fans' collection!

products.name: Back to the Future III Movie Masterpiece Vehicle 1/6 DeLorean Time Machine 72 cm
products.description:
The final installment of the Back to the Future trilogy finds Marty McFly digging the trusty DeLorean out of a mineshaft in the Wild West of 1885, trying to rescue Doc Brown and put the past, present and future on track so they can all get back to where - and when - they belong.

Sideshow and Hot Toys proudly presents the DeLorean Time Machine Sixth Scale Collectible Vehicle based on the classic Back to the Future III coming with adjustable wheels turning it into a DeLorean off-road car.

This new DeLorean Time Machine sixth scale figure accessory is fully crafted with expert attention to detail to recreate its iconic appearance with hood box and rail wheels. Measures 72cm long, the entire vehicle is applied with delicate weathering effects and features multiple LED light-up points on the exterior design and interior controls, signature gull-wing doors, a highly-detailed hood box with belts attached, real-like cable wires across the exterior structure, detail recreation of the firebox temperature device, Mr. Fusion energy reactor, time machine engine deck, and cabin controls. Comes with detailed accessories such as a firebox temperature device, alarm clock, and tow bar to recreate scenes. Wheel position is adjustable for travelling on uneven open terrain, also attachable rail wheels convert it into Rail DeLorean for alternate display.

Great Scott! Be sure to include this 1/6th scale DeLorean Time Machine collectible vehicle to your Time Travelling collection.

Product Size: 25 x 35 x 72 cm

products.name: Star Wars: Ahsoka Action Figure 1/6 Captain Enoch 30 cm
products.description:
Grand Admiral Thrawn's captain of the guard, Captain Enoch is an ominous sentinel. Enoch wears a modified helmet with a golden face hammered into his mask.

Continuing the collectible series of the highly acclaimed, Star Wars: Ahsoka, Hot Toys is delighted to present the new Captain Enoch Sixth Scale Collectible Figure.

The highly-accurate Star Wars collectible figure is meticulously crafted based on the appearance of Captain Enoch featuring greatly detailed helmet and armors with crackle-effect painted in metallic gold, masterfully applied weathering effects, blaster, and a figure base!

Recruit the Captain Enoch into your Star Wars sixth scale figure collection today!

products.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice Movie Masterpiece Action Figure 1/6 Batman 2.0 (Deluxe Version) 32 cm
products.description:
In the 2016 film Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, Gotham City's formidable vigilante Batman becomes increasingly concerned about the unchecked powers of god-like superheroes. This fear drives Batman to take on Metropolis' revered superhero, Superman, resulting in a conflict between the two. As Batman and Superman engage in a battle of principle, strategy, and sheer will, a new menace emerges to threaten civilization as never before.

Sideshow and Hot Toys is proud to present an enhanced version of the Batman Sixth Scale Collectible Figure from the Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice collection. Version 2.0 of this popular figure features improved detailing and accuracy to the cinematic version of the Dark Knight. Collectors will appreciate the obsessive care taken to faithfully reproduce every subtle nuance that brings the appearance of Batman to life with striking realism.

The movie-accurate DC Comics collectible figure is specially crafted based on the image of Batman from the film, featuring a newly developed Bruce Wayne head sculpt with separate rolling eyeballs features and two styles of hair sculptures; newly crafted Batman cowled head with seamless neck joint, separate rolling eyeballs features and interchangeable lower faces techniques design; a new specialized body highlighting Batman's muscular physique, especially on the arm shape; meticulously tailored Batsuit and a selection of Batman gadgets.

The Deluxe Version includes a rotatable cowled head, a wired batcape, and a specially designed diorama backdrop of the antiquated alleyways with multiple ways to display and recreate iconic scenes from both movie and comic pages.

This upgraded Batman action figure is sure to be a centerpiece of any fan's collection.

products.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice Movie Masterpiece Action Figure 1/6 Batman 2.0 32 cm
products.description:
In the thrilling movie Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, fans witness the clash of two legendary superheroes - Batman and Superman - as their paths intertwine in a battle that shapes the fate of civilization.

Based on this epic cinematic masterpiece, Sideshow and Hot Toys is delighted to introduce the sixth scale figure Batman (2.0) collectible figure to captivate the hearts of every fan and serve as the centerpiece of any collection. From the intricately designed costume to the lifelike facial features, every aspect of this collectible exudes the essence of the iconic Dark Knight.

The movie-accurate collectible figure is specially crafted based on the image of Batman from the film, featuring a newly developed Bruce Wayne head sculpt with separate rolling eyeballs features and two styles of hair sculptures; newly crafted Batman cowled head with seamless neck joint, separate rolling eyeballs features and interchangeable lower faces techniques design; a new specialized body highlighting Batman's muscular physique, especially on the arm shape; meticulously tailored Batsuit and a selection of Batman gadgets.

Bat fans, this Batman (2.0) figure is an absolute-have for fans of DC Comics!

products.name: Star Wars: Ahsoka Action Figure 1/6 Captain Rex 30 cm
products.description:
Rex once served the Republic on the frontlines during the Clone Wars, taking orders from Anakin Skywalker™ and Ahsoka Tano™ as first a captain and later a commander. He viewed military service as an honor, and his loyalty to the Republic and his Jedi Generals was absolute. But when Order 66 was executed, it was Ahsoka who helped to free Rex from the programming of his inhibitor chip. At the dawn of the Empire, Rex has escaped with his life but is considered killed-in-action in the eyes of the new regime. That allows him to operate in the shadows and help any clone brothers who remain separate from the Imperial ranks.

Continuing the expansion of the incredible collectibles inspired by the Ahsoka™ live-action series, Hot Toys is thrilled to introduce the new Captain Rex™ Sixth Scale Collectible Figure!

The highly-accurate collectible sixth-scale figure features detailed recreation of Rex's distinctive Clone Trooper armor and helmet with amazing paint applications, interchangeable Clone Trooper Phase 1 and Phase 2 armor parts and pauldrons, Rex's signature dual blaster pistols as well as a blaster rifle, a thermal detonator, and a newly designed sand theme figure base!

Now it's a great time to have the Captain Rex collectible figure in your Star Wars collectibles collection!

products.name: Iron Man 2 Action Figure 1/4 Iron Man Mark VI 48 cm
products.description:
The Iron Man Mark VI armor is an iconic creation of Tony Stark! Through meticulous engineering and relentless innovation, he has crafted a suit stronger and more formidable than any that came before it. In Iron Man 2, the Mark VI armor is tested to its limits as it engages in intense battles against Ivan Vanko and his drones. These confrontations showcase the high-tech suit's strength, agility, and advanced weaponry.

Inspired by and referenced from the Iron Man 2 movie, Sideshow and Hot Toys are thrilled to present the Iron Man Mark VI Quarter Scale Figure. Through meticulous attention to detail, the craftsmanship at Hot Toys has brought the sleek sophistication and power of this legendary sixth iteration of Iron Man's powered suit to three-dimensional life.

Masterfully crafted 1/4th scale figure depicting Iron Man Mark VI armor from the movie. Measuring approximately 48 cm tall, the Iron Man action figure allows for dynamic posing across its full range of motion with over 40 points of articulation. Battle damaged interchangeable parts bringing alternate looks of the armor right off the screen. products.name: The Dark Knight DX Action Figure 1/6 The Joker 31 cm
products.description:
Heath Ledger's version of the Joker in The Dark Knight is a remarkable performance that still gets recognized today as one of the best depiction of the character outside of the DC comic book. Despite his limited screen time, the Joker steals the show by his menacing presence over the movie. He's the agent of chaos, the unstoppable force to Batman's immovable object.

Throughout the years of figure creations, Hot Toys has been constantly pursuing and offering the highest quality standards, made possible by the talents of our skillful craftsman. Now, we are revisiting a legendary character portrayed by Heath Ledger by presenting The Joker Sixth Scale Collectible Figure that captured every chilling details with our advanced crafting techniques.

This time we have worked closely with Derek Kwok (Hong Kong Film Director) for a custom-tailored costume based on The Joker's signature purple coat outfit in Nolan's The Dark Knight. From the choice of material to the cuts and layer arrangements, Derek showed his professionalism and expressed great passion, combining Hot Toys' workmanship to give the real fabric costume the highest level of screen accuracy.

Coming from the DX series, the latest one-sixth Joker figure is notably crafted based on Heath Ledger's portrayal of The Joker in the movie. Features a newly developed head sculpt with separate eyeball rolling system, iconic make-up accented by the red grin, two styles of expressions including a gesturing tongue, and detailed green coiffed hair sculpture with the curls hanging within the strands.

The Joker's real fabric costume including his purple topcoat, blazer, vest, dress shirt, pants, socks, are all recreated with fine texture and accurate patterns. Most importantly, we have introduced a form-fitting body unique to this figure, reflecting his actual physique yet giving great articulations under a layered costume.

His chaotic look completed with detailed weapons and accessories such as guns, grenades, knives, playing cards, bank note and a LED lighted diorama base with the famous bat symbol. It's a base with two lighting modes for alternate display.

The Joker figure is a terrific addition to your DC Comics collectibles display.

"Anakin is gone. I am what remains." - Darth Vader

After being restored by Darth Sidious™ following his brutal defeat by Obi-Wan Kenobi on the fiery lava-world Mustafar™, Darth Vader is fully consumed by the dark side of the Force, leading the Empire's eradication of the Jedi Order and hunting down his former master...

Sideshow and Hot Toys is delighted to present the next collectible of the Obi-Wan Kenobi live-action series with the new sixth scale Darth Vader Collectible Figure!

The Star Wars collectible figure is meticulously crafted with a battle-damaged helmet revealing the scarred head sculpt of the former Anakin Skywalker equipped with rolling eyeball function allowing positionable eyeline, battle damaged chest control panel, LED light-up belt boxes, LED light-up Lightsaber, an interchangeable lightsaber blade emulating the weapon in motion, a pair of Third Sister's lightsabers, and a rocky diorama base!

Search your feelings and welcome the new Darth Vader collectible figure in your display!

products.name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness Movie Masterpiece Action Figure 1/6 The Scarlet Witch 28 cm
products.description:
"You break the rules and you become a hero. I do it and I become the enemy." - The Scarlet Witch

After the loss of Vision and a life-changing experience with her two imaginary children in WandaVision, Wanda Maximoff's grief has triggered her to become the biggest threat in Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness. She's obsessed with using the potential of the multiverse to find an alternate reality where her twin sons are real and alive, and she's willing to kill anyone who gets in the way of that goal.

Inspired by the recently released Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, Sideshow and Hot Toys is excited to introduce The Scarlet Witch Sixth Scale Collectible Figure from the bending universe.

Beautifully crafted based on the appearance of Elizabeth Olsen as The Scarlet Witch in the movie, the figure features a newly developed head sculpt and tiara with stunning likeness, two styles of front hair sculptures, specially applied luminous reflective effect on eyes to emulate Scarlet Witch using her abilities, faithful recreation of costume in scarlet red applied with dramatic weathering effects, highly-detailed accessories such as the Darkhold, different styles of power-using effects accessories, interchangeable hands with black finger tips and a figure stand.

Expand your Marvel collection today with the stunning Scarlet Witch figure.

products.name: Star Wars: Episode II Action Figure 1/6 C-3PO 29 cm
products.description:
Programmed for etiquette and protocol, "Threepio" was built by a young Anakin Skywalker, and has been a constant companion to astromech droid R2-D2. In Attack of the Clones, C-3PO left with Anakin and R2-D2 for Geonosis, where he had a bit of a misadventure - accidentally swapping heads with a battle droid. C-3PO found he was "quite beside himself" literally on the wrong side of the first battle of the Clone Wars.

In celebrating the 20th anniversary of Star Wars: Attack of the Clones, Sideshow and Hot Toys is excited to officially present a series of Star Wars collectibles based on this landmark film for fans!

The all-new C-3PO Sixth Scale Collectible Figure is skillfully crafted in diecast material featuring detailed mechanical design with amazing weathering effects, LED light-up eyes, a blaster, an interchangeable Battle Droid head, a figure base, and a special designed commemorative packaging!

This human-cyborg relations protocol droid will be an excellent addition to your Star Wars collection alongside the R2-D2 sixth scale figure!

products.name: Star Wars Episode V Movie Masterpiece Action Figure 1/6 Luke Skywalker Bespin 28 cm
products.description:
After seeing a vision of his friends in distress, Luke Skywalker is determined to save them despite cutting his training short against Jedi™ Master Yoda's™ wishes. The young Skywalker raced to Cloud City on Bespin™ where Darth Vader™ awaited, hoping to capture Luke and bring him to the Emperor...

Continuing to expand the extraordinary collectible series, Sideshow and Hot Toys is pleased to officially introduce the new sixth scale collectible figure of Luke Skywalker in his Bespin attire!

The highly-accurate collectible figure is meticulously crafted based on Luke Skywalker's appearance in the movie. It features a head sculpt with remarkable likeness and separate rolling eyeballs, two styles of interchangeable hair sculptures, finely tailored outfit, a LED light-up lightsaber, an interchangeable lightsaber blade emulating the weapon in motion, a blaster, and a carbon-freezing chamber themed base!

Don't pass up on the opportunity to add this iconic Luke Skywalker collectible figure to your collection today.

products.name: Jango Fett Hot Toys MMS589 sixth scale figure (Star Wars Episode 2)
products.description:
Embark on an Intergalactic Adventure with the Hot Toys Jango Fett Figure

A stunning testament to the craftsmanship and dedication of Hot Toys, this 1/6 scale masterpiece brings the infamous bounty hunter, Jango Fett, to life in all his glory.


Exceptional Detailing:

The figure stands as a beacon of precision and authenticity. From the battle-scarred helmet to the intricate Mandalorian armor, every detail has been meticulously sculpted and painted to mirror the character's on-screen presence. The weathering effects add a touch of realism, telling the story of countless battles in the far reaches of the galaxy.


Articulation Beyond Boundaries:

Featuring over 30 points of articulation, this figure allows collectors to recreate Jango Fett's most iconic poses and dynamic action sequences. Whether you envision him in mid-flight with his jetpack engaged or wielding his blaster pistols with deadly accuracy, the figure's poseability ensures you can bring your favorite scenes to life.


A Bounty of Accessories:

Jango Fett's diverse arsenal is faithfully reproduced in exquisite detail. The dual blaster pistols, the iconic Westar-34 blaster, and the wrist gauntlet with its grappling hook and blade—all are present and accounted for. What's more, Hot Toys has gone above and beyond by providing a range of interchangeable hands, allowing you to customize Jango's gestures and expressions.


Display with Distinction:

The figure comes complete with a specially designed display base that not only ensures stability but also adds an extra layer of storytelling. Display Jango Fett amidst the harsh terrain of a distant planet or alongside other Star Wars collectibles to create a captivating diorama that pays homage to the galaxy far, far away.


Limited Edition Excellence:

Hot Toys continues to set the standard for collectible figures with this limited edition release. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to quality, each Jango Fett figure is a unique work of art, destined to become a prized possession for discerning collectors and Star Wars enthusiasts alike.


The Legacy Lives On:

Don't miss the opportunity to add the Hot Toys Jango Fett figure to your collection. As the legacy of one of Star Wars' most enigmatic characters lives on, this figure stands as a testament to the enduring appeal of the galaxy's renowned bounty hunters.

products.name: Star Wars The Clone Wars Action Figure 1/6 Coruscant Guard 30 cm
products.description:
This elite group of clones guards was led by Clone Commander Fox™. It was their task to keep the peace on Coruscant™, to protect important buildings, and to supplement the job of the Senate Guard. They escorted Jedi™ and other senatorial dignitaries to protect them on official missions. They were also the group in charge of hunting down Ahsoka Tano™ when she was accused of murder in the wake of the Jedi Temple bombing.

Inspired by the Star Wars: The Clone Wars animation series, Sideshow and Hot Toys present the Coruscant Guard Sixth Scale Collectible Figure!

The highly detailed collectible figure features meticulously crafted and finely detailed recreation of Clone Trooper armor and helmet, Coruscant Guard's distinctive armor color with weather effects, an assortment of weapons, and a display base!

Expand your trooper collection with the new Coruscant Guard Sixth Scale Collectible Figure!

products.name: Star Wars Action Figure 1/6 Lando Calrissian The Empire Strikes Back 40th Anniversary Collection 30
products.description:
In his youth, Lando Calrissian™ was a sportsman seeking a fortune at the sabacc tables. After he lost his beloved ship to Han Solo™, Lando spent years living the high life and pursuing get-rich-quick schemes, with uneven results. He went semi-respectable as the baron administrator of Cloud City, only to be drawn into the fight against the Galactic Empire.

Celebrating the 40th anniversary of Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back, Sideshow and Hot Toys is thrilled to continue expanding the series of throwback collectibles based on this iconic film and delighted to officially introduce the new sixth scale collectible figure of the beloved smooth talker - Lando Calrissian!

The highly-accurate Lando Calrissian Sixth Scale Collectible Figure is skillfully crafted based on his appearance in the movie featuring a newly developed head sculpt with astonishing likeness, meticulously tailored outfit and cape, two blasters, a communicator, a wrist link, a figure base with Cloud City backdrop all in a specially designed retro-style packaging!

Now it's the perfect time to welcome Lando Calrissian to your Star Wars collection!

products.description:
With the fame of the Batman Arkham game series continues to spread globally, some of the iconic characters from Batman: Arkham Knight have gained immense popularity. To keep up the momentum, Hot Toys present Batgirl from one of the downloadable episodes A Matter of Family. Determined to save her father from The Joker, Babara Gordon, a.k.a. Batgirl has to battle against the Joker along with Robin. Highly sought after by "Bats" fans, here comes the Batgirl Sixth Scale Collectible Figure.

Beautifully crafted based on Batgirl's appearance in the video game, the Batgirl Sixth Scale Figure features a newly developed masked head sculpt with long light brown real fabric hair, a newly developed body tailored for Batgirl, a sophisticated tailored Batsuit with gold color Bat logo on the chest as well as light copper-colored armor on arms, a light copper color belt, an array of Bat gadgets including grapnel gun with Batclaw, Batarangs and a Remote Hacking Device. Last but not least, the figure also comes with a specially designed figure stand with game logo and backdrop.

Dress your shelf with this brilliant piece and place it along with the Arkham game series now!

products.name: Nebula Hot Toys MMS534 1/6 action figure (Avengers : Endgame)
products.description:
Earth Mightiest Heroes failed to stop Thanos from collecting the Infinity Stones, which he used to wipe out half the universe’s population. Nebula was among those who survived after the events of Avengers : Infinity War, leaving her and Rocket as the only remaining Guardians alone on Titan with Tony Stark. She will have no choice but to work with others and finally see the true value of family.

Longed for by many Marvel fans, Hot Toys is excited to officially present Gamora’s adopted sister - Nebula in sixth scale collectible figure from the upcoming Avengers : Endgame.

The figure is carefully crafted based on the image of Nebula in the movie with meticulous workmanship, featuring a newly developed head sculpt with prominent cybernetics details, a newly developed body highlights Nebula’s prosthetic arm revealing intricate mechanical parts, perfectly tailored Ravenger’s jumpsuit with fine textures, iconic weapons including blaster and batons, lightning effect accessory attachable to the baton, a movie-themed figure stand, and an interchangeable graphic card.

The Luphomoid assassin is waiting for you to bring her to your ever-expanding Avengers : Endgame collection !

What's in the box of Nebula Hot Toys MMS534 ?

An authentic and detailed likeness of Nebula in Avengers : Endgame

Specially applied metallic black-colored painting on the mechanical arm with a detailed design

Newly developed body with over 28 points of articulation

Approximately 29.5 cm tall

A newly developed head sculpt with blue and purple skin texture, mechanical design and movie-accurate facial expression

Each head sculpt is specially hand-painted

Seven (7) interchangeable hands (right with glove) including:

- One (1) right hand for holding a blaster

- One (1) pair of fists

- One (1) pair of relaxed hands

- One (1) pair of hands for holding a baton

Costume :

One (1) pair of burgundy red-colored boots

One (1) burgundy red-colored one-piece battle suit with asymmetry shoulder armor

One (1) burgundy red-colored belt with pistol holster on the thigh

One (1) blaster

Two (2) long batons

From the hit FPS HALO: Reach, comes Noble Team's second-in-command, KAT-B320 (Noble Two) as a 1/12 scale fully-articulated action figure!

Newly sculpted parts are made to recreate her distinctive female Spartan form.

The exterior armor pieces are made from ABS plastic to depict the intricate mechanical details while the die-cast used in the inner frame provides an overall durability and a wide range of articulation.

Included with the figure are MA37 Assaule Rifle, and a variety of interchangeable hand parts. "

Details of accessories supplied with ThreeZero's Megaman MDLX figure

The Megaman figure box contains two interchangeable face plates that allow you to switch between different expressions, and a piece of the iconic Rock Buster forearm (Mega Buster) that's interchangeable with either the left or right forearm. The set also includes a Fire Storm effect piece to attach to the end of the Rock Buster. Interchangeable hands include a pair of open hands, a pair of posed hands and a pair of fists.

 

Manufacturing information provided by ThreeZero

Composition: ABS, PVC and metal.

products.name: Fallout FigZero Action Figure 1/6 Sole Survivor (Male) 31 cm
products.description:
From the highly-acclaimed Fallout video game franchise, threezero proudly presents the 1/6 Sole Survivor, the iconic protagonist from Fallout 4!

Standing at approximately 12" (30.9cm) tall, the Fallout - 1/6 Sole Survivor (Male) collectible figure boasts a fully-articulated 1/6 scale body, offering with approximately 32 points of articulation. Meticulously crafted, this figure showcases intricate sculpted details and expertly-applied costume tailoring and weathering effects, authentically capturing the formidable and resilient essence of the Sole Survivor.

The 1/6 Sole Survivor (Male) figure comes equipped with a wide array of accessories, allowing you to recreate various memorable scenes from the game. These accessories include the legendary weapon Big Boy, Kellogg's pistol, the Charisma Vault Boy Bobblehead, the Pip-Boy 3000 Mark IV with an interface card, and the mysterious serum. With these meticulously crafted accessories, you can truly immerse yourself in the world of Fallout and bring the Sole Survivor's adventures to life.

This figure includes three sets of interchangeable hands, offering a range of posing options. The sets comprise a pair of relaxed hands, a pair of fists, and a pair of holding hands, ensuring versatility in displaying the figure to suit your preferences.


FEATURES

- 1/6th scale, approximately 12 inches (30.9 cm) tall
- Fully-posable body with approximately 32 points of articulation
- Finely-tailored costume
- Highly detailed sculpt with weathered paint effects
- Several weapons and accessories

COSTUME

- 1 x Boiler Suit
- 1 x Holster
- 1 x pair of Bracers
- 1 x Belt with pouches
- 1 x pair of Boots

ACCESSORIES

- 1 x Pip-Boy 3000 Mark IV
- 1 x Interface card for Pip-Boy
- 1 x Big Boy
- 1 x Kellogg's pistol
- 1 x Charisma Vault Boy Bobblehead
- 1 x Mysterious serum
- 3 x pairs of interchangeable hands: One (1) pair of Relaxed Hands, one (1) pair of Fists, one (1) pair of Gripping Hands for holding accessories

products.name: Fallout FigZero Action Figure 1/6 T-60 Power Armor 37 cm
products.description:
From the highly-acclaimed Fallout video game franchise, threezero is releasing a reissue of the T-60 Power Armor! One of the most advanced models of power armor, the T-60 is one of the most widely-used in the game, presented here with an articulated endoskeleton body, detailed T-60 outer-armor plating, and assault rifle.
The 1/6 T-60 Power Armor showcases a burnt iron color scheme. Along with threezero's exquisite weathering paint technique, the figure captures the armor's post-apocalyptic aesthetic.
The 1/6 T-60 Power Armor is built upon an endoskeleton frame with over 35 points of articulation and magnetic connection points, allowing for freely interchangeable armor pieces that are compatible with all other threezero Fallout 1/6 Power Armor figures. The helmet features an LED light-up function, and accessories include a detailed male head sculpt that can be swapped with the armor helmet as well as an assault rifle with two exchangeable magazines and a removable scope.

FEATURES

- 1/6th scale, approximately 14.5 inches (36.8 cm) tall
- Fully-posable endoskeleton body with over 35 points of articulation
- Incredibly-detailed mechanical parts
- Full set of T-60 Power Armor plating
- Multi-layered paint application and weathering effects
- T-60 Helmet features light-up LED function*
- All outer-armor pieces are detachable and interchangeable with all previous and future 1/6 Fallout Power Armor endoskeletons

ACCESSORIES

-1x interchangeable male head sculpt
-1x assault rifle with removable scope
-2x exchangeable magazines


Requires AG1 x3 Batteries (Not Included).

products.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Statue Tails Standoff 32 cm
products.description:
First 4 Figures is proud to introduce their latest resin collectible, Sonic the Hedgehog 2 - Tails Standoff.

SONIC THE HEDGEHOG 2 - TAILS STANDOFF

Tails, also known as Miles "Tails" Prower, is a two-tailed anthropomorphic fox renowned for flying using his twin tails like helicopter rotors. He demonstrates exceptional intelligence, excelling as a highly skilled mechanic and inventor.

This statue is a homage to a pivotal moment from the Sonic the Hedgehog 2 movie where Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles confront Dr. Robotnik amidst the streets of Green Hills. The statue faithfully captures Tails in a flying pose, showcasing meticulous detailing from his amber fur to his distinctive red and white shoes. The base portrays the scene's shattered road adorned with a touch of smoke, enhancing its atmospheric design. This collectible is part of an engaging three-part series that's perfect for displaying as a set.

Sonic the Hedgehog 2 - Tails Standoff includes:
- Sonic the Hedgehog 2 - Tails Standoff resin painted statue
- Statue inspired by the last battle with Dr. Robotnik in Sonic the Hedgehog 2
- Part of a three-part series that could be displayed together
- Limited edition numbering and authentication card

Size: 27,5 x 25 x 31,5 cm

products.name: Mario Kart PVC Statue Mario Collector's Edition 22 cm
products.description:
Wahoo! First 4 Figures is proud to present the high-quality PVC collectible, Mario from the beloved video game, Mario Kart which debuted in 1992. Everything you know and love about Mario is brought to life in this incredible statue. Realistic touches add depth and nuance to the smallest details - from fabric and stitching on his bright red cap to the smoke coming off of the spinning wheels of his go-kart. The go-kart itself is modeled after the classic Pipe Frame design, with lifelike parts and details.

The Collector's Edition of this statue has an expanded base with LED light-up function.
The base's design makes it appear as if Mario is speeding across the finish line! Long
lights all around the base glow a brilliant white when activated.

Comes with the following:

- Exquisitely detailed PVC statue of Mario
- Pose inspired by video game
- Round black base with finishing line and race track details
- LED function for the base (Static Mode only)
- F4F Leaflet with 500 F4F reward points included

Size: 22 cm

USB-C powered LED Base requires 1x 18500 battery, not included - available separately (DPO18500)

products.name: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild PVC Statue Urbosa Collector's Edition 28 cm
products.description:
First 4 Figures proudly presents Gerudo Champion and pilot of the Divine Beast Vah Naboris: Urbosa!

Urbosa is brought to life with stunning detail in this high-quality PVC statue. Her dynamic pose makes her appear in mid-twirl, with her skirt and hair flowing free. The base's design features the Sheikah Eye symbol, consistent with the other statues in the First 4 Figures The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild lineup.

The Collector's Edition of this statue has two (2) light-up LED modes (Static and Animated) in the base. When activated, the Sheikah Eye symbol will glow a brilliant blue: steadily on in Static mode and pulsating in Animated mode.

The Legend of Zelda;: Breath of the Wild - Urbosa (Collector's Edition) comes with the following:

- Exquisitely detailed PVC statue of Urbosa with pose inspired by official artwork
- Highly detailed base featuring the Sheikah Eye symbol.
- Two (2) Light-up LED modes (Static and Animated) for the base
- F4F Leaflet with 500 F4F reward points included

Size: 18 x 20,8 x 28,4 cm

Batterie required (1x 18500, not included) - available separately (DPO18500) - With USB-Plugin (cable not included)

products.description:
Now available from S.H. Figuarts, from the anime series “Dragon Ball Daima” is Super Saiyan 4 Son Goku (Mini)!
										This figure boasts a completely new design depicting Goku unleashing his new powers! Even with its compact height of approximately 80mm, the movable design developed for the S.H. Figuarts Dragon Ball series allows you to relive the countless action scenes you’ve seen in the series.
Among the exchangeable facial expressions are normal, as well as grinning and clenched teeth. Two shouting facial expressions with different mouth shapes are also included. You can use them to recreate the series of Kamehameha poses Goku showed to Third Eye Gomah.
It also comes with four sets of exchangeable hand parts left/right, and as an added bonus, there are exchangeable hand parts left/right with energy bullets that you can use with the S.H. Figuarts Son Goku (Mini) Daima figure (sold separately), too.
